ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(Services_Finance_Support__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Services_Proposal_Support__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Deal_Governance_Review_Support__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Services_Legal_Support__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL( Solution_Architect__c , "Yes"))), $RecordType.Name="Request Custom Service Support")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select at least one resource or close support request
